attributes.action: Ensure that a general election is held upon the the advent of any circumstances resulting in the inability of the Prime Minister to act in said role.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When the Prime Minister steps down, is required to step down or for any other reason cannot continue in that role there is created a situation where any, non-elected to that role individual can take that vitally important position as long as they are selected to do so by and from the ruling party. In the interest of engaging the British people and honestly representing their views we petition the Prime Minister that in this situation a General Election is called for earliest possible date.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
